item.title: Summer Internship
item.description: The Be-Winnors project hosts a yearly cohort for student interns to learn how to apply their STEM education to conduct research in an academic environment.

item.title: COVID-19 Mobile Health App
item.description: With the surge in need for home healthcare with the growing aging population and now with the COVID-19 pandemic, we will need more sensor fusion and mobile health technologies to assess patient needs at home and intelligent control of cyber health.

item.title: Shower-assistive Robot
item.description: This assistive robot enables users to independently shower without the help of a home healthcare worker.

item.title: Summer 2021 Internship
item.description: Students are paired with CSULA EECS faculty and graduate student mentors to help make meaningful contributions in one of the projects core technology areas.
